title: How to learn mongoDB
content: mongoDB is a computer programming language often used to build websites and software, automate tasks, and conduct data analysis. mongoDB is a general-purpose language, meaning it can be used to create a variety of different programs and isn't specialized for any specific problems.
author: Utsav
